Author: Blooym
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Major improvements to the in-game friend system, like getting login and logout notifications for your friends, and much more.
Description:
A plugin that improves to the in-game friend system.

Key Features:
- Send and receive notifications when your friends login and logout*.
- Get notified when your friends use the world visit system*.
- Chat messages showing how many of your friends are online when you log in.
- Private in design, all identifying information is hashed before being sent to the server.

 * Other friends must also have GoodFriend installed.
